channel.title: How To add items To your client and server
channel.description:
Difficulty 2/10
Ok first you go onto a website with client hacking or something the same. next you find a item like Dragon full helm
this is what it should look like [code]if(i == 9908) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 7205; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 984; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 126; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 7204;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 7203;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Full Helm";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A Dragon Full Helm".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
kk now open you client and open class 8.java
Type down an item thats in the client like quest cape
Now under that is a bracket like the one i just showed you.
Start the new code under that bracket. now exit and compile there should be no errors
Now open Your server file Go to items list.cfg and Youll see codes alot
heres an example [code]item = 9908 Dragon_Full_helm dragon full helm 1000 400 600 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 0 0 0 0 [/code] also if you forgot the code of the item go back to class 8 look for the item name and look at the id now enter that like this [code]item = Id Name of item Name of item 1000 400 600 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 [/code]
Add that compile and your done ill add pictures at the bottom
[url=http://img170.imageshack.us/my.php?image=class8egq0.png][img=http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/9124/class8egq0.th.png][/url]
[url=http://img170.imageshack.us/my.php?image=itemegz8.png][img=http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/1429/itemegz8.th.png][/url]

item.title: How To add items To your client and server
item.dc:creator: @Skull25 Skull25
item.description:
@Skull25 wrote:

Difficulty 2/10

Ok first you go onto a website with client hacking or something the same. next you find a item like Dragon full helm

this is what it should look like

if(i == 9908) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 7205; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 984; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 126; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 7204;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 7203;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Full Helm";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A Dragon Full Helm".getBytes();//examin info }

kk now open you client and open class 8.java

Type down an item thats in the client like quest cape

Now under that is a bracket like the one i just showed you.

Start the new code under that bracket. now exit and compile there should be no errors

Now open Your server file Go to items list.cfg and Youll see codes alot

heres an example item = 9908 Dragon_Full_helm dragon full helm 1000 400 600 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 0 0 0 0
also if you forgot the code of the item go back to class 8 look for the item name and look at the id now enter that like this

item = Id	Name of item	Name of item	1000	400	600	100	100	100	100	100	100	100	0	0	0	0	0

Add that compile and your done ill add pictures at the bottom

[img=http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/9124/class8egq0.th.png]

[img=http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/1429/itemegz8.th.png]

Read full topic
item.source: How To add items To your client and server
